name: A Super Happy Story (About Feeling Super Sad) presented by Silent Uproar

shows.title: A Super Happy Story (About Feeling Super Sad)
shows.desc:
Silent Uproar’s hilarious cabaret musical that explains, sings and throws glitter about how it’s OK not to be OK. Written by Olivier award winner Jon Brittain, it’s a buoyant, gleeful, sugar coated show! Except for the bits about depression.

Age recommendation: 12+ (strong language and content that some people may find distressing)
Running Time: 70 minutes

Silent Uproar creates playful and provocative new work “by telling stories that will make the world a little less sh*t”.
